Articles.Content:
As a KSP fan, I feel we should use our rockets as an instrument of Anti-SOPA/PIPA so here is the Anti-PIPA/SOPA Banner addon! Just open the installer and select your KSP parts directory in the path box!

http://www./?sc98enup5cqsc1a

I dare you, I double dare you, say what one more time and I will blow your brains out, you\'hear me?

Now, does SOPA look like, a BITCH?

'What?-'BOOM
All future rockets shall have the KSP-standard anti SOPA module! Launch them to infinity, and beyond!
Seems a little random. I promise you that this file is free of viruses too. I just thought I\'d cater for the people that don\'t have Winrar and can\'t be bothered getting it.
Let\'s land one of these flags on the Mun and send the screenshot to some high ranking official!
.. Make the photo look like on of the photos taken on the moon when the Apollo series visited..
New challenge - spam mun and kerbin with many, many anti SOPA satellites.

As a KSP fan, I feel we should use our rockets as an instrument of Anti-SOPA/PIPA so here is the Anti-PIPA/SOPA Banner addon! Just open the installer and select your KSP parts directory in the path box!

http://www./?sc98enup5cqsc1a

Good job you didn\'t post it on megaupload! I now officially... Wait... No, can\'t say that the US government will censor it... Hang on... I\'m European... But they could still censor me?! I heavily disapprove of SOPA!

Lets see if you can put the words 'protest' and 'anti-SOPA' into your keywords, see if it can attract more google/youtube search viewers.

With 105 views and 5 \'likes\', I think it\'s a small step for kerbinkind but... (insert the rest)

My full support goes here because after I saw the Anti SOPA/PIPA banner on the home page, I thought up a theory of how this game was born:

One day, HarvesteR and his buddies were hanging out in HarvestoR\'s place derping around on the internet. One of them finds a picture of a rocket and says 'damn, we should make our own rocket game'.

Hence, after thinking up the name of the Species of Accident Prone Green Men known as Kerbalkind, KSP was born.

Hence, after thinking up the name of the Species of Accident Prone Green Men known as Kerbalkind, KSP was born.

Nope. They duct taped tinfoil men to firecrackers. Multi stage firecrackers. No joke.
Nope. They duct taped tinfoil men to firecrackers. Multi stage firecrackers. No joke.
